meanings: to bow one's head in assent

lessons.japanese: うなずくことは承知の合図だ。
lessons.english: A nod is a sign of agreement.

lessons.japanese: うなずくことは承知の合図だ。
lessons.english: A nod is a sign of agreement.

lessons.japanese: 当然だな、といった顔つきでうなずく。
lessons.english: He nods as if to say "of course".

lessons.japanese: 当然だな、といった顔つきでうなずく。
lessons.english: He nods as if to say "of course".
